name: Pokémon Outlaw
overview: Pokémon Outlaw is a Pokémon FireRed hack which its theme is crime. Just like its brothers Pokémon CAWPS and Pokemon Korosu, Pokémon Outlaw is unlike the others which contain the story of a 10 years old child. This is the story of a 15 years old orphan boy who is homeless and lives in the slums. Throughout this game, you will follow and watch his rise to greatness in the Pokémon world.
